title: The Year in JavaScript: Top JS News Stories of 2024
author: Loraine Lawson
description: The New Stack looks back at the victories and battle scars that marked JavaScript’s evolution during its 29th year.
cntitle: 2024 年 JavaScript 回顾：年度 JavaScript 热点新闻
cndescription: The New Stack 回顾了 JavaScript 在其 29 年发展历程中取得的胜利和留下的伤痕。
